name: IQuest Coder V1
description: Open-source coding AI from China's Ubiquant hedge fund that matches or beats Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT 5.1 on coding benchmarks using only 40B parameters. Features three variants (Instruct, Thinking, Loop) with novel Code-Flow Training on commit histories and repository evolution patterns.
community_quotes: Matches or beats Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT 5.1 on coding benchmarks with only 40B parameters
Uses novel Code-Flow Training on commit histories and repository evolution patterns
Fully open source with self-hosting capabilities
Specializes in algorithmic thinking and competitive programming
Efficiency breakthrough: 10-20x smaller than Western models while matching performance

name: ChatDev 2.0 (DevAll)
description: Zero-code multi-agent orchestration platform for 'Developing Everything'. Evolved from ChatDev 1.0's virtual software company model into a comprehensive platform where users can build and execute customized multi-agent systems through simple configuration without coding. Features visual workflow design, Python SDK, and built-in scenarios for data visualization, 3D generation, game development, and deep research.
community_quotes: Zero-code multi-agent orchestration platform for developing everything
Visual workflow canvas with drag-and-drop agent configuration
Python SDK for automation and batch processing
Built-in scenarios for 3D modeling, game dev, and deep research

name: Spec Coding by Capacity
description: Vibe coding tool that emphasizes planning before building. Features an AI co-founder that helps define specifications, target audience, and key requirements before any code is written, then generates production-ready code based on those specifications.
community_quotes: Stop vibe coding - define your specifications first, then let AI build production-ready code
Ranked #3 Product of the Day on Product Hunt with 243 upvotes
AI co-founder helps you define what you're building, who it's for, and what matters before coding
